Texts.Chs:
吃了这些东西显然会让你笨上加笨。
^cyan;+^white;10% ^pink;暗影^cyan;抗性^gray;，赋予^pink;暗影污染^cyan;免疫^gray;(^white;持续2m^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
Eating these apparently makes you stupider than you already are.
^cyan;+^white;10% ^pink;Shadow ^cyan;Res^gray;, ^pink;Shadow ^cyan;Immunity ^gray;(^white;2m^gray;)^reset;
